text: all the futurama parts were funny
all the simpsons parts were reused simpsons jokes
the family guy/simpsons crossover was disappointing too
Haven't seen that episode but it doesn't surprise me.  Don't know what's happening to the show but in the last couple of years the quality of the writing has declined a lot.
cool trick in iOS: you can glue your text view / form fields to the onscreen keyboard by registering for the `UIKeyboardWillChangeFrameNotification` notification.

That notification has keys in its info dictionary that give the beginning and ending frames of the keyboard, as well as the duration of the keyboard's animation (`UIKeyboardFrameBeginUserInfoKey`, `UIKeyboardFrameEndUserInfoKey`, and `UIKeyboardAnimationDurationUserInfoKey`)
Then you can update your views' frame with an animation of the same duration, and on the front end it looks like it's attached to the keyboard!
This also works with the new iOS 8 keyboard predictive text feature ("QuickType")
